name: #08 Escape the Egyptian Tomb
description:
(Created for the 2021 Cryptex Jam)

Your tour of the wonders of Egypt has gone awry when you were separated from your tour group and fell into a forgotten grotto. Can you Escape from the Egyptian Tomb?

Written by Darren Miller
Graphics by Errol Elumir

An illustrated 8-bit adventure game made with Adventuron.
